properties.name: jp.ecuacion.splib.web.home-page
properties.description: Required. It's used to specify the destination page from system error page. ex: 'public/show/page?id=home'

properties.name: jp.ecuacion.splib.web.navbar.title
properties.description: Optional. It's shown on the left side of the navbar. It can be localized by being defined at messages.properties. ex: 'AWS instance manager'

properties.name: jp.ecuacion.splib.web.navbar.title-account
properties.description: Optional. It's shown on the left side of the navbar when the site is in the state of login. If it's not specified, 'jp.ecuacion.splib.web.navbar.title' value is used. It can be localized by being defined at messages.properties. ex: 'AWS instance manager (logged in)'

properties.name: jp.ecuacion.splib.web.navbar.title-admin
properties.description: Optional. It's shown on the left side of the navbar when the site is in the state of admin login. If it's not specified, 'jp.ecuacion.splib.web.navbar.title' value is used. It can be localized by being defined at messages.properties. ex: 'AWS instance manager (admin)'

properties.name: jp.ecuacion.splib.web.navbar.image-path
properties.description: Optional. It specifies the path of the image shown on the left side of the navbar. ex: '/images/bootstrap-logo.svg'

properties.name: jp.ecuacion.splib.web.navbar.image-path-account
properties.description: Optional. It specifies the path of the image shown on the left side of the navbar when the site is in the state of login. If it's not specified, 'jp.ecuacion.splib.web.navbar.image-path' value is used.  ex: '/images/bootstrap-logo.svg'

properties.name: jp.ecuacion.splib.web.navbar.image-path-admin
properties.description: Optional. It specifies the path of the image shown on the left side of the navbar when the site is in the state of admin login. If it's not specified, 'jp.ecuacion.splib.web.navbar.image-path' value is used.  ex: '/images/bootstrap-logo.svg'

properties.name: jp.ecuacion.splib.web.navbar.default-page-path
properties.description: Optional. It specifies the path of the destination page. ex: '/public/show/page?id=home'

properties.name: jp.ecuacion.splib.web.navbar.default-page-path-account
properties.description: Optional. It specifies the path of the destination page when the site is in the state of login. If it's not specified, 'jp.ecuacion.splib.web.navbar.default-page-path' value is used.  ex: '/public/show/page?id=home'

properties.name: jp.ecuacion.splib.web.navbar.default-page-path-admin
properties.description: Optional. It specifies the path of the destination page when the site is in the state of admin login. If it's not specified, 'jp.ecuacion.splib.web.navbar.default-page-path' value is used.  ex: '/public/show/page?id=home'

properties.name: jp.ecuacion.splib.web.navbar.background-color-class
properties.description: Optional. It specifies the background color class of navbar. It's mainly used to clarify the environment (used in non-product environment). The default value is 'bg-color-navbar'.

properties.name: jp.ecuacion.splib.web.bootstrap.is-background-gradient
properties.description: Optional. It specifies whether the background of bootstrap components are gradient. default value is false.

properties.name: jp.ecuacion.splib.web.body.background-color
properties.description: Optional. It specifies the background-color of the page in the app. default value is '' (means white).

properties.name: jp.ecuacion.splib.web.body.background-image
properties.description: Optional. It specifies the background-image of the page in the app. It's assumed to use linear-gradient color. default value is '' (means white).
